title: In open air: a portrait of the American impressionists
creator_credit: Roger Snodgrass, Paul Johnson and Smithsonian Institute
brief_description: A documentary about the late 19th century American Impressionists. The film reveals the nature of these artists’ sensibility and work; the specific French Impressionists from whom they drew inspiration; and the various artistic communities which they founded in America.
